00007 namespace Qt3 { // can't be Qt, a class already exists with that name :(
00008 
00009     enum NewFlags {
00010         AlignAuto = 0x0000,
00011         AlignJustify = 0x0080, // This is NOT the Qt 3 value, but we have to use another one !
00012         AlignHorizontal_Mask = Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignRight | Qt::AlignHCenter | AlignJustify,
00013         AlignVertical_Mask = Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignBottom | Qt::AlignVCenter,
00014         WStaticContents = Qt::WNorthWestGravity,
00015         WType_Dialog  = 0x00000002,
00016         WStyle_Dialog = 0x00000002
00017     };
00018 
00019     enum TextFlags {
00020     SingleLine  = 0x0080,       // misc. flags
00021     DontClip    = 0x0100,
00022     ExpandTabs  = 0x0200,
00023     ShowPrefix  = 0x0400,
00024     WordBreak   = 0x0800,
00025     DontPrint   = 0x1000        // internal
00026     };
00027 
00028     enum WordWrap {
00029     NoWrap      = 0x0000,
00030     WidgetWidth     = 0x2000,
00031     FixedPixelWidth = 0x3000,
00032     FixedColumnWidth= 0x4000
00033     };
00034 
00035     enum WrapPolicy {
00036     AtWordBoundary  = 0x0000,
00037     AtWhiteSpace    = AtWordBoundary, // deprecated, don't use
00038     Anywhere    = 0x8000
00039     };
